title: server
body: Was in a ranked game and everyone was experiencing lag which caused me to being disconnected and upon reconnecting to the client i downloaded the game to review and its clear that many people were experiencing the same issue and disconnected as well. can something be done with lp losses and win/losses?

replies.body:
When we realized that our servers were having issues keeping playing connected to their game, we worked quickly to bring down Ranked Play to prevent any more disconnects. Although adjusting LP is not something we can do, rest easy that we _are _ working to help remedy any other issues players may have run into due to the disconnects.

Thanks for being patient while we get this all worked out!
